author: jstrachan
msg: Removed the use of System.out.println() in cases where there is no ServletContext initialized as yet.
In addition there's now a helper method getLog() which can be used for logging from inside an MDO with a far better API than the simple servlet-style log(String).

author: jstrachan
msg: Updated the links to CVS HEAD versions of the config files

author: jstrachan
msg: enabled JNDI destionations for JBoss topics to match queues. I think this was removed by error

author: jstrachan
msg: Applied Bill Christian's patch that isDurable() was incorrectly returning a different property! DOH! Thanks for this Bill.
